name: Isle be Lost
description:
The forgotten isles was once home to the council of Wizards. A long time ago it was engulfed with darkness. You have been tasked to find the ancient tome, and restore balance to the Wizards force. Good luck brave wizard.

Collect essence from killing enemies, deposit the essence into the scattered shrines. Find the lost level, and obtain the ancient tome.

Controls - movement: WASD, shift, space   abilities: F, left and right mouse buttons.
